name: Wreckage (itch) (migueldiasbrito)
description:
This game was developed for Coursera Game Design and Development with Unity 2020 Specialization  course.

I added the following features to the course base project:

  • Text display
  • Cutscenes with text and animations
  • Background story displayed in the cutscenes
  • Three new levels
  • New enemy that shoots bullets at the player
  • New enemy that chases the player
